attributes.action: Don't punish mixed age couples when one partner turns to pension age
attributes.background:
When one partner turns pension age, most benefits get taken away and you end up struggling to make ends meet.

Scrap the mixed age penalisation

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about changes to benefit entitlements if one member of a couple reaches state pension age, but we're not sure exactly what changes you'd like the Government to make to entitlements to benefits.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
